itu.bednet.router.dsdv.minders
Class BroadcastMinder

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      itu.bednet.router.dsdv.minders.BroadcastMinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class BroadcastMinder
extends java.lang.Thread

Periodically sends out messages to all neighbors containing the routing table This is the only one who can change the Sequence Number except for RouteManager in the init method.

Author:
Arnar
